  labels = {["virtual"]}>
The specified value has been assigned to a stack location.

Load or store it there, with appropriate extension if necessary.

### getStackAddress() {#af4e5afbe552950619ae377ed75fc9805}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register M68kIncomingValueHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-h">M68kCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-cpp/#l00166">166</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/lib/target/m68k/gisel/m68kcalllowering-cpp">M68kCallLowering.cpp</a>.
